scripts.run_psql: docker run -it --rm -h 0.0.0.0 -p 5433:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=ui_test -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD='1qaz!QAZ' -e POSTGRES_DB=ui_test  -v ~/var/lib/postgresql/data  postgres
scripts.create_users: PGPASSWORD='1qaz!QAZ' psql --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5433 --user ui_test --dbname ui_test  -c 'CREATE TABLE users (acct VARCHAR(32) PRIMARY KEY, pwd VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, fullname VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NUll, updated_at TIMESTAMP)'
